trivia
Class MainGame

java.lang.Object
  trivia.GameMode
      trivia.MainGame

public class MainGame
extends GameMode

Pulls questions from text files based on which categories are selected. Displays those questions and answers. Right answers are give points based on how fast they are answered. Wrong answers lose points.

Author:
Cody Swendrowski, Dan Miller
